Articles.Content: Gas planet 2: ~50% larger than Jool, with rings. Early version shown on a stream a while ago. does anybody have a link to the stream that it was shown in.
I remember it was on the KerbalCon livestream. Bit hard for me to get a link right now but if nobody posts one, I'll get it later.
does it have moons? id like to see a picture or two, if someone would be so kind

does it have moons? id like to see a picture or two, if someone would be so kind

It will have moons. But if I remember this correctly they weren't on the showed picture(s?).
Post the picture. I want to see!
Just found it in the depths of internet. Here you go - early version of "gas giant 2":

Just found said picture in the depths of internet. Early version of "gas giant 2":

http://i.imgur.com/0fCDzz4.png

Looks like I found a new favorite planet:O

Also, planned moons for it have quite interesting features:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29807-Planet-Ideas-And-Names-For-The-Future-Of-Kerbal-Space-Program?p=447959&viewfull=1#post447959

Keep in mind these are just plans. Who knows how this is going to end up when will be implemented into the game.

Edited October 13, 2013 by jcraft
Hopefully we'll get some more powerful LV-N rocket motors when the new gas giants are implemented.
